articles.title: How DraftKings’ CFTC-Regulated Predictions Platform Accessing Non-Sportsbook States Has Changed Its Investment Story (DKNG)
articles.mainIdea: How DraftKings’ CFTC-Regulated Predictions Platform Accessing Non-Sportsbook States Has Changed Its Investment Story (DKNG)
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: How DraftKings’ CFTC-Regulated Predictions Platform Accessing Non-Sportsbook States Has Changed Its Investment Story (DKNG). DraftKings recently launched DraftKings Predictions, a standalone CFTC-regulated app and web platform that lets eligible U.S. customers trade event contracts on sports, finance, and other real-world outcomes across 38 states, including large markets like California, Florida, Georgia, and Texas. By moving into federally regulated prediction markets and connecting to exchanges like CME Group, DraftKings is extending its reach beyond traditional sportsbooks and into states where online sports... Related tickers mentioned: DKNG.

articles.title: Hogs Pop Higher to Begin the Holiday Week
articles.mainIdea: Hogs Pop Higher to Begin the Holiday Week
articles.summary: Barchart: Hogs Pop Higher to Begin the Holiday Week. Lean hog futures were up 65 to 85 cents across most contracts on Monday. USDA’s national base hog price was reported at $67.16 on Monday afternoon, down 29 cents from the day prior. The CME Lean Hog Index was down 15 cents on December 18 at $83.73. Export Sales data...
